definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: The thickened septa are most often smooth, but septal nodules may sometimes be seen.
sentences.chinese: 增厚的小叶间隔常平滑，但有时可呈结节状。

sentences.english: Surface conduit and support should be fixed strongly and arranged into order.
sentences.chinese: 明配管及其支架应平滑牢固，排列整齐。

sentences.english: Leiomyosarcoma of the small intestine is an uncommon tumor.
sentences.chinese: 小肠平滑肌肉瘤是一种罕见的肿瘤。

sentences.english: Angiomyolipoma was also found in the contralateral kidney.
sentences.chinese: 血管平滑肌脂肪瘤也发现对侧肾。

sentences.english: Button on the side of the plane or edge for a smooth transition for the arc-shaped.
sentences.chinese: 按钮的侧面棱边可为平面或为圆弧状的平滑过渡。

sentences.english: Cheeks - Smoothly formed and flat, without heavy jowls.
sentences.chinese: 面颊平滑而平坦，颚部不能太重。

sentences.english: During that period, the style for men was to wear their hair plastered down on their heads.
sentences.chinese: 在那个时期，男人们的时尚是留平滑头发。

sentences.english: Finally, the smoothing of BPSK modulation, and optimization of its performance are performed.
sentences.chinese: 最后提出了平滑化BPSK调制，优化了性能。

sentences.english: The inside and outside of the vessel were smoothed and red ochre slip was applied.
sentences.chinese: 内部和外部的船只进行平滑和红色赭石采用滑动。

sentences.english: "It's really amazing how smooth these trajectories are, " he says.
sentences.chinese: “这些轨迹线都呈现出不可思议的平滑状态，”他说。

sentences.english: Some sensors have their own data smoothing internal circuitry.
sentences.chinese: 某些传感器自身就具有数据平滑内部电路。

sentences.english: The sturdy crossfader module can be placed on the left or right side.
sentences.chinese: »唱片平滑转换器可放置在左侧或右侧。

sentences.english: It acts directly on vascular smooth muscle as a potent vasoconstrictor.
sentences.chinese: 它可直接对血管平滑肌作为一种强有力的血管收缩剂。

sentences.english: That smoothness is due to a thick layer of dust blanketing the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 这平滑是由于一层厚厚的灰尘笼罩的景观。

sentences.english: Panicle branches proximally smooth or sparsely scabrid angled.
sentences.chinese: 圆锥花序分枝下部的平滑的或疏生粗糙的有棱。

sentences.english: Objective:To discover the clinical and pathological expression of skin leiomyoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨皮肤平滑肌瘤的临床病理表现。

definition: vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
veined pattern/wrinkles/vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
